long_description:
With this mod, you will be able to find randomly generated graves and cemeteries in your world.

Density can be controlled by setting.

This mod hsould be used with Luanti 5.12 or newer. Cemetries are be generated very often in older versions.
name: cemeteries
short_description: Generate graves and cemeteries in world. For Luanti 5.12 and newer.
title: Cemeteries
